text: 6.18 Nam 23.19, 1 Sml 15.29, Hib 12.1 Pen mɨñɨl takaw omɨŋal mɨdeb, God ne yepɨs ma apin nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak ak sek, ne gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agak ak sek. Takaw omɨŋal anɨb okok tɨg adɨkɨl gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Pen chɨn nopun, God ne yepɨs agep tek ma lup. Anɨb ak chɨn binɨb pɨlɨkɨl, God yɨl we gɨlɨg opun okok, gos sek yonɨgun. God ne gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agak ak nɨŋɨd, chɨnop dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak kod mɨdobun.
